Please Take Good Care of Cute Xmas Slippers:

1, PP cotton material, Keep away from pet（pet like to bite, tell your pet that is not a toy)  2, Keep away from the wet and put the Christmas slippers on a dry and ventilated place. 3, In order to avoid tailors, fabric rupture and eye off, hand washable, please avoid washing machine. 4, There is maybe slight color difference because of display resolution.
